alert.note: Alert for Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 30 at 1:21AM MDT until August 30 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning Wednesday afternoon from 12 PM through 8 PM for zones 417, 418, and 427... .The combination of gusty winds, warm temperatures and low humidity will create critical fire weather conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT, DRY, AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417, 418, AND 427... * AFFECTED AREA...In east-central Wyoming Fire Zones 417 and 418.In southeast Wyoming Fire Zone 427. * WIND...West at 20 to 25 MPH with gusts up to 40 MPH. * HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland; North Snowy Range Foothills
